--- title: Ptan Extension keywords: fastai sidebar: home_sidebar summary: "Temporary extension of ptan. Mainly adding the option to remove `None`'s from iteration." description: "Temporary extension of ptan. Mainly adding the option to remove `None`'s from iteration." nb_path: "nbs/05a_ptan_extend.ipynb" ---

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class ExperienceSource[source]

ExperienceSource(env, agent, steps_count=2, steps_delta=1, vectorized=False, seed=0) :: ExperienceSource

Simple n-step experience source using single or multiple environments

Every experience contains n list of Experience entries

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
class TestAgent(ptan.agent.BaseAgent):
    def __call__(self,s,ss):return [0]*len(s),[0]*len(s)
env_source=ExperienceSource([gym.make('CartPole-v1') for _ in range(2)],TestAgent())
for i,o in enumerate(env_source):
#     print(o)
    if i>100:break
{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class ExperienceSourceFirstLast[source]

ExperienceSourceFirstLast(env, agent, gamma, steps_count=1, steps_delta=1, vectorized=False, exclude_nones=False, seed=0) :: ExperienceSource

Simple n-step experience source using single or multiple environments

Every experience contains n list of Experience entries

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
class TestAgent(ptan.agent.BaseAgent):
    def __call__(self,s,ss):return [0]*len(s),[0]*len(s)
env_source=ExperienceSourceFirstLast([gym.make('CartPole-v1') for _ in range(2)],TestAgent(),gamma=0.99,steps_count=4,exclude_nones=True)
for i,o in enumerate(env_source):
#     print(o)
    if i>100:break
{% endraw %}
